name: (FAN MADE) Sky Brother Force - The Side Scroller!
name_original: (FAN MADE) Sky Brother Force - The Side Scroller!
description:
I CAN'T STRESS ENOUGH HOW FAN MADE THIS IS (this is literally the first game I have ever made yes it's only 30 seconds long but it's just for fun) 

For distinction and triumph! I made an 8-Bit side scroller to celebrate the audio space opera anime masterpiece, Sky Brother Force! Check it out at: https://linktr.ee/skybrotherforce

Check out my Twitter: https://twitter.com/CharlieeMcQueen
